title: Lenses Group Schema
description: Schema for defining a Lenses Group as per the Lenses API spec.

name.description: The unique name of the group. Lowercase alphanumeric or hyphens, not starting/ending with hyphen, max 63 chars.

display_name.description: Display name for the group. If not provided, the value of 'name' will be used.

items.description: Principal name (user or service account) to be a member of this group.

members.description: List of principal names (users, service accounts) to be members of this group.

items.description: Name of a role to be bound to this group.

roles.description: List of role names to be bound to this group.

metadata.description: Custom string key/values to attach to the group. Max 50 keys, 40 bytes key, 500 bytes value.
